text: Calamba's at-large congressional district is the congressional district of the Philippines in Calamba. It has been represented in the House of Representatives of the Philippines since 2019. Previously included in Laguna's 2nd congressional district, it includes all barangays of the city. It is currently represented in the 18th Congress by Jun Chipeco Jr. of the Nacionalista Party, who has represented the district since its creation. == Representation history == {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" |# ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" |Member ! colspan="2" |Term of office ! rowspan="2" |Congress ! rowspan="2" |Party ! rowspan="2" |Electoral history ! rowspan="2" width="33%" |Constituent LGUs |- !Start !End |- | colspan="9" style="text-align:center;" |District created September 24, 2018, redistricted from the Laguna's 2nd district.Biñan gets own congressional district |- |1 | style="background:;" | |Jun Chipeco Jr. |June 30, 2019 |Incumbent |18th |Nacionalista |Re-elected in 2019. | align="center" |2019–present: Calamba |} == Election results == === 2019 === == See also == * Legislative district of Calamba ==References== Category:Congressional districts of the Philippines Category:Politics of Laguna (province) Category:2018 establishments in the Philippines
title: Calamba's at-large congressional district
